お金を下ろす: (おかねをおろす) - to withdraw money; to take money out
お金本位: (おかねほんい) - money-centered way (of thinking)
お釜: (オカマ) - pot; volcanic crater; (one's) buttocks; (often derog.) male homosexual/effeminate man/male transvestite
お釜を掘る: (おかまをほる) - to perform anal sex/to bugger/to sodomize/to sodomise; to crash a car into the back of another (usu. used in the passive voice)/to rear-end
お鉢が回ってくる: (おはちがまわってくる) - one's turn finally comes round
お鍋: (おなべ) - pot; typical name for a female servant in the Edo-period; working at night; (often derog.) female with symptoms of gender identity disorder (i.e. a transvestite)
お門違い: (おかどちがい) - barking up the wrong tree; calling at the wrong house
お開き: (おひらき) - breakup (of a ceremony, wedding, party, meeting, etc.); closure
お開きにする: (おひらきにする) - to break up (e.g. a meeting); to call it a night
お陰: (おかげ) - grace (of God)/benevolence (of Buddha)/blessing; assistance/help/aid; effects/influence
お陰さまで: (おかげさまで) - (I'm fine) thank you; thanks to you; fortunately; under the gods' shadow
お陰で: (おかげで) - thanks to ...; owing to ...; because of ...
お陰様で: (おかげさまで) - (I'm fine) thank you; thanks to you; fortunately; under the gods' shadow
お隠れ: (おかくれ) - passing away; dying; death
お隠れになる: (おかくれになる) - to die; to decease; to perish; to pass away
お隣さん: (おとなりさん) - the next-door neighbour (neighbor)
お雇い外国人: (おやといがいこくじん) - hired foreigners; foreign advisors hired by the Japanese government for their specialized knowledge to assist in the modernization of Japan at the end of the Bakufu and during the Meiji Era
お雑煮: (おぞうに) - soup containing rice cakes and vegetables (New Year's dish)
お雛様: (おひなさま) - set of dolls on display
お零れに預かる: (おこぼれにあずかる) - to get a tiny share of the profits; to get a small share of what someone is enjoying
お預け: (おあずけ) - postponement; wait (until one is given permission)
お預けを食う: (おあずけをくう) - to have to wait (for the realization of something hoped for); to be forced to postpone
お預けを食らう: (おあずけをくらう) - to have to wait (for the realization of something hoped for); to be forced to postpone
お題目: (おだいもく) - Nichiren chant; (an empty) slogan
お願いだから: (おねがいだから) - please; I beg you; for mercy's sake
お願いできますか: (おねがいできますか) - may I ask (for); might I ask (that)
お願いを聞く: (おねがいをきく) - to grant someone's request
お願い出来ますか: (おねがいできますか) - may I ask (for); might I ask (that)
お願い申し上げる: (おねがいもうしあげる) - (very polite) please
お風呂に入る: (おふろにはいる) - to take a bath
お飾り: (おかざり) - decorations; offerings; mere window dressing
お餅: (おもち) - rice cakes; pounded mochi rice
お馬鹿さん: (おばかさん) - silly person; dumb-bunny; dope
お馴み: (おなじみ) - familiar; well-known; regular (e.g. customer); old stand-by
お馴染み: (おなじみ) - familiar; well-known; regular (e.g. customer); old stand-by
お駄賃: (おだちん) - little something; reward; tip
お高くとまる: (おたかくとまる) - to assume an air of importance; to be self-important; to put on airs
お高く止まる: (おたかくとまる) - to assume an air of importance; to be self-important; to put on airs
お高く留まる: (おたかくとまる) - to assume an air of importance; to be self-important; to put on airs
お高祖頭巾: (おこそずきん) - kerchief worn by women in former times in Japan in cold weather, covering the whole head (except eyes)
か: (か) - (was written as 歟; used at sentence-end) indicates a question (sometimes rhetorical); (after each alternative) or/whether or not; (after an interrogative)  some- (e.g. something, someone); (sometimes after other particles)  indicates doubt, uncertainty, etc.; (usu. before an adjective)  emphatic prefix; (after an indeclinable word)  suffix forming adjectives or adverbs; in that way
かあかあ: (かあかあ) - caw-caw (the sound of a crow cawing); crow
かいな: (かいな) - (at sentence end) expresses incredulousness, disbelief, irony, etc.
かいま聞く: (かいまきく) - to get wind of
かいま見る: (かいまみる) - to take a peep at; to catch a glimpse of
かい摘む: (かいつまむ) - to sum up; to summarize; to summarise
かい込む: (かいこむ) - to carry under the arm; to rake in; to scoop up
かえるの目借時: (かえるのめかるどき) - springtime mating of frogs (haiku term)
かかえ込む: (かかえこむ) - to hold a thing in one's arms/to carry in one's arms/to embrace (e.g. a baby); to take upon oneself/to be saddled with
かかと落とし: (かかとおとし) - axe kick; ax kick
かかり合い: (かかりあい) - relationship; connection; involvement; entanglement; implication (e.g. in a crime)
かかり合う: (かかりあう) - to have dealings with; to be involved in
かかわり合う: (かかわりあう) - to get involved or entangled in; to get mixed up in; to have something to do with; to have dealings with
かがみ込む: (かがみこむ) - to lean over; to lean in
かがり火: (kagaribi) - fire built in an iron basket (vigiar fogo, fogo de pesca, etc.), bonfire, campfire
かきこ: (かきこ) - post (to a BBS); comment (on a blog)
かき上げる: (かきあげる) - to comb upwards; to brush up (a loose strand of hair)
かき乱す: (かきみだす) - to stir up; to disturb
かき交ぜる: (かきまぜる) - to mix; to stir; to scramble; to churn
かき分ける: (かきわける) - to push one's way through
かき切る: (かききる) - to cut; to slit
かき口説く: (かきくどく) - to complain; to pester; to plead; to beg
かき合せる: (かきあわせる) - to adjust; to arrange
かき回す: (かきまわす) - to stir up; to churn; to ransack; to disturb
かき寄せる: (かきよせる) - to sweep; to rake up
かき揚げ: (kakiage) - tempurá de legumes e frutos do mar; algo puxado para cima; acendendo o pavio de uma lâmpada
